Package model

Class CompositeSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • model.ComponentSensor
        • model.CompositeSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, ProxyCreator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MeanSensor, RootSensor
    public abstract class CompositeSensor
extends ComponentSensor
    This class inherits of the ComponentSensor and is in charge of being composed of ComponentSensors in the composite pattern.

        public void add​(ComponentSensor child,
                double coef)
         throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is meant to add a component child to the composite.
        Parameters:
        child - is a ComponentSensor meant to be a child
        coef - is the coefficient to know how important is the component compared to the others

        java.lang.Exception
